name: Nightgaunt
description: The Nightgaunt is a large aberration with an eerie presence, characterized by its stealth and terror-inducing abilities as it hunts dreams.
memorable: It is not only tough but also utilizes psychological tactics to cripple its foes.
goals: Hunting dreams and instilling fear in its enemies.
relations: Often encountered with other nightmare-inducing creatures, capable of coordinating with allies due to its Pack Tactics.
environment: Typically found in areas associated with nightmares or dark, dream-like realms.
strengths: Excels in ambush tactics utilizing stealth, psychological terror, and teamwork.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence restricts complex strategies or interactions.
attacks: Employs sharp Clutching Claws for grappling and a poisonous Barbed Tail to deal significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Baneful Presence, imposing disadvantage on foes within its vicinity.
senses: Possesses blindsight out to 120 feet, making it highly aware of its surroundings.
skills: Excels in Stealth, allowing it to remain undetected during ambushes.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can fly without provoking opportunity attacks through Flyby ability.
Uses Pack Tactics to gain advantage on attacks when allies are nearby.
Grants a significant psychological disadvantage to enemies with Baneful Presence.
Grapples its prey effectively, restraining them with its Clutching Claws.
test_queries: large stealthy monster that hunts dreams
intimidating entity that instills fear and grapples
nightmare creature with poisonous barbed tail
aberration that excels in ambush tactics
formidable foe with magical resistance and stealth
